title: First Look: Campagnolo’s New Shamal Wheels get Deeper Dual-Profile Rims
content:
Campagnolo roll out deeper, dual-profile rims for improved aerodynamics in cross-winds, while shaving over 100 grams off the overall weight for a claimed weight of 1,480g

Read the full article at First Look: Campagnolo’s New Shamal Wheels get Deeper Dual-Profile Rims on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
